name: Urgent Delivery
description:
A game about delivering bombs to be defused, except they are still ticking! Return the bombs to the correct zones to stay alive.

Controls: W to go forward, A and D to turn

S to brake/reverse

NOTE: We know that the general UI and scene changing of the game is very incomplete, but we were running very low time D:

All assets made in 72 hours for the completion jam
